title: Cancelled approval task does not trigger the parent entity to process the cancellation task
content:
Cancelled Approval task no longer triggers the parent entity to process the cancelled approval.

Cause

The parent entity is not getting notified about the cancellation task.

Solution

  1. Go to the parent entity. 
  2. Edit the description with dummy changes, such as adding a period or blank space. 
  3. Save the changes.
The workflow status will be updated automatically.
